Every Man Jack, Skin. Volcanic Clay 2 in 1 Mask + Cleanser (2020 formulation)

Brand: Every Man Jack

Category: Facial Cleanser

Brand: Every Man Jack

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER/AQUA/EAU, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, SODIUM C14-16 OLEFIN SULFONATE, ALOE BARBADENSIS (ALOE VERA) LEAF JUICE, GLYCERIN, BENTONITE (VOLCANIC CLAY), PANTHENOL (VITAMIN B5), HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, ALLANTOIN, CITRUS GRANDIS (GRAPEFRUIT) SEED EXTRACT
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
